content: knitted jacket for babies and children in drops alpaca the piece is worked top down with raglan and 2-coloured english rib sizes 0 4 years pattern z-109-by yarn group a **sizes** 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years child s height in cm 48/52 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92 - 98/104 **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 50-100-100-100 100-100 g colour 7323 sea fog 50-50-50-100 100-100 g colour 9020 light pearl grey drops buttons no 503 5-5-5-5 6-6 items **needles** drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 60 cm drops double pointed needle size 2 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 48 row in height with english rib = 10 x 10 cm
